input_args.passage: 'Mitchell, Elizabeth | Maine | “Libby” Mitchell was born in South Carolina, but her hometown is Vassalboro. She attended Furman University for her B.A.; University of North Carolina at Chapel ...'
input_args.claim: 'From source, we learn that Libby Mitchell represented the 24th State Senate District from 2004 to 2010, was the Speaker of the Maine House of Representatives and as President of the Maine Senate (2008–2010), becoming the first woman in the United States to have held both positions, and the third person ever to do so.'
